hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Liquidity Trap During Stress Regimes
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes (VIX > 25, BTC 10-day volatility > 40%), meme coins (DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP) will experience exaggerated 1-day selloffs (-15% to -25%) followed by sharp 48-hour mean reversion bounces of +8-12% as speculative liquidity re-enters at perceived oversold levels.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins attract panic selling during stress but retain dedicated retail communities that buy perceived 'dips.' The high volatility creates overshoots that revert quickly. This is a tactical bounce trade, not a trend reversal.
entry_conditions: DOGE/PEPE/TRUMP down >15% in 24h on elevated volume (>2x 30-day avg)
Entry on first 4-hour candle close above lower Bollinger Band (20,2) after oversold condition

exit_conditions.stop_loss: New 24h low after entry OR -5% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If meme coin continues making lower lows for 3 consecutive 4-hour periods after entry, or if BTC dominance continues rising >1% per day (capital flight to safety).
